page.title: 01GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content: Grid square 03280315 is located on the south-facing slopes of the Mountains of Mourne in Co. Down. The area is immediately to the north of the main town of the region - the fishing port and market town of Kilkeel. The low rolling hills of the region are ideally suited to the pastoral and mixed farming carried on here. Consequently, the population is very sparce and scattered. The region is one of exceptional natural beauty and remains largely unspoilt by the activities of "urban man".
